item.description:
• Bug: Fixed preview image aspect ratio issue
  • Bug: Fixed preview image performance issue
  • Bug: Fixed issue where secondary screen's dock moves to main screen after closing secondary screen
  • Bug: Optimized pasteboard plugin performance
  • Bug: Fixed crash when option + tabbing when multi-window applications are empty
  • Feat: Added support for uploading custom launchpad buttons
  • Feat: Added new Keep in Dock feature
